neurotools.signal.resonator module¶

neurotools.signal.resonator.resonantDrive(s, f, tau, x, Fs=1000)[source]¶

Drive resonator with frequency f and time constant tau and state s with signal state x f in Hz tau in seconds Fs in samples/second

Convert tau into discrete update: x(t) = exp(-t/tau) dx/dt = -1/tau x(t) tau dx/dt = -x(t) x = x + dt*(-1/tau x(t)) x = x - dt/tau x x = (1 - dt/tau) x

Convert frequency into radians f is in cycles / second Fs is in samples / second We need radians / sample There are 2 pi radians / cycle theta = f*2*pi/Fs

neurotools.signal.resonator.resonantFiltfilt(x, f, tau, order=1)[source]¶
neurotools.signal.resonator.resonantFilter(x, f, tau, Fs=1000)[source]¶
